name: Hermit
description: You lived for a time in seclusion, either in a sheltered community or entirely alone, devoted to contemplation and self-discovery. During your isolation you gained insight into healing and the natural world.

features.name: Healer
features.description: You gain proficiency with Healer's Kit. When you use it to stabilize a dying creature, that creature regains 1 Hit Point. As an action, you can use a charge to restore 2d6 + your Proficiency Bonus Hit Points to a creature.
